alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Union, northwestern Itawamba, northern Lee, southeastern Tippah and southern Prentiss Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blair, or near Baldwyn, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baldwyn, Saltillo, Guntown, Mantachie, Wheeler, Pratts Friendship, Blair, Dumas, Marietta, Graham, Thrasher, Jericho, Branyan, Ellistown, Kirkville, Jug Fork, Geeville, Locum, Hobo Station and Chapelville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
